In the Matter of the Guardianship of the Person and Estate of Susan Hillygus, a Protected Person Roger Hillygus, Appellant,
v.
Robin Renae Renwick; and Kaycee Zusman, Respondents. No. 77204 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED NOVEMBER 05, 2018

In the MATTER OF the HILLYGUS FAMILY TRUST DATED AUGUST 17, 1993

DISMISSED.
